snippet: Food stamp recipients in 10 states were unable to use their debit cards for about six hours after a malfunction at JPMorgan Chase.
abstract: Food stamp recipients in 10 states are unable to use their debit cards for about six hours after a malfunction at JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: Food stamp recipients in 10 states were unable to use their debit cards for about six hours after a malfunction at JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Malfunction Causes Food Stamp Debit Cards to Fail
headline.print_headline: Malfunction Causes Food Stamp Debit Cards To Fail
